code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";export var questionSlice=createSlice({name:"question",initialState:{questionId:null,questionName:null},reducers:{setQuestionInfo:function setQuestionInfo(state,action){state.questionId=action.payload.questionId;state.questionName=action.payload.questionName;}}});var setQuestionInfo=questionSlice.actions.setQuestionInfo;export{setQuestionInfo};export var selectQuestionId=function selectQuestionId(state){return state.question.questionId;};export var selectQuestionName=function selectQuestionName(state){return state.question.questionName;};export default questionSlice.reducer;
